mapper.sql: OnLine_ID, OnLine_UserID, OnLine_Session, OnLine_CreateTime, OnLine_ModifyTime, OnLine_Version, OnLine_Status, OnLine_Deleted
mapper.insert: insert into rb_onlines (OnLine_ID, OnLine_UserID, OnLine_Session, OnLine_CreateTime, OnLine_ModifyTime, OnLine_Version, OnLine_Status, OnLine_Deleted ) values (#{onlineId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{onlineUserid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{onlineSession,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), now(), 0, #{onlineStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, 0 )

OnLine_ID,
OnLine_UserID,
OnLine_Session,

OnLine_Deleted,
#{onlineId,jdbcType=BIGINT},

mapper.update:
update rb_onlines
OnLine_UserID = #{onlineUserid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
OnLine_Session = #{onlineSession,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OnLine_CreateTime = #{onlineCreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
OnLine_ModifyTime = now(),
OnLine_Version = OnLine_Version+1,
OnLine_Status = #{onlineStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},
OnLine_Deleted = #{onlineDeleted,jdbcType=TINYINT},
WHERE OnLine_ID = #{onlineId} AND OnLine_Deleted = 0

update rb_onlines set OnLine_UserID = #{onlineUserid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, OnLine_Session = #{onlineSession,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OnLine_CreateTime = #{onlineCreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, OnLine_ModifyTime =now(), OnLine_Version = #{onlineVersion,jdbcType=INTEGER}, OnLine_Status = #{onlineStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, OnLine_Deleted = #{onlineDeleted,jdbcType=TINYINT} where OnLine_ID = #{onlineId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
